-- !!BBE105!! Do not delete this line
Require("levels/lib/ant.lua")
function file_oxyd(x,y,f) oxyd_default_flavor=f oxyd(x,y) end levelh=13 levelw=20 enigma.FlatForce=30 enigma.SlopeForce=30 enigma.ElectricForce=30 cells={} items={} actors={} stones={} actors[" "]=cell{} stones[" "]=cell{} cells[" "]=cell{} items[" "]=cell{} cells["!"]=cell{floor="fl-acblack"} stones["!"]=cell{stone="st-rock6"} stones["#"]=cell{parent={{file_oxyd,"c"}}} stones["$"]=cell{stone="st-grate1"} stones["%"]=cell{stone="st-stone_break"} stones["&"]=cell{stone="st-swap"} stones["'"]=cell{stone="st-wood"} items["!"]=cell{item="it-hammer"} items["#"]=cell{item="it-document"} function ac_whiteball(x,y) n="" p=0 f=0 if (x==18) and (y==7) then n="ac18x7" p=0 mf=1,66666666666667 end set_actor("ac-whiteball",x+0.5,y+0.5,{player=p,name=n,mouseforce=mf}) end actors["!"]=cell{parent={{ac_whiteball}}} level={"!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"} acmap={" ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ! ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " "} itmap={" ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ", " ! ## ", " ", " ! ", " ", " ", " "} stmap={"!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!", "!#$!$$!$!$$$$%%%%#!!", "!!!!$$!#!$$&$%%%%!#!", "!$$$$$!!!$&!$%%%!#%!", "!$$$$$$$$$$&$%%!%%%!", "!$$$$$$$$$$$$%!%%%%!", "!%%%%%!!!!!!!!%%%%%!", "!%#%%! $$$ ' ' !", "!%%%!$&$$$$$$$$$!!!!", "!%%!%$!&$$$&!$$$!$$!", "!#!%%$&$$$$$$$$$!!!!", "!!#%%$$$$$$$$$$$$$$!", "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"} create_world_by_map(level) draw_map(0,0,stmap,stones) draw_map(0,0,itmap,items) draw_map(0,0,acmap,actors) SetAttrib(enigma.GetItem(16,7),"text","text1") SetAttrib(enigma.GetItem(17,7),"text","text2") oxyd_shuffle()

el:string.el:english: One more and you won't get this hammer until you don't need it anymore !
